publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-418 John Scott: Ayr Advertiser 200th Anniversary-That the Parliament congratulates the Ayr Advertiser, Scotland's oldest weekly newspaper, on the advent of its 200th anniversary and offers its best wishes to the newspaper and its staff for continued success in delivering the highest quality of journalism to the people of Ayr and Ayrshire.
S2M-418 Ayr Advertiser 200th Anniversary (lodged on 26 September 2003) John Swinburne*
S2M-418 Ayr Advertiser 200th Anniversary (lodged on 26 September 2003) Mr Brian Monteith*, Fiona Hyslop*
S2M-418 Ayr Advertiser 200th Anniversary (lodged on 26 September 2003) Mrs Nanette Milne*
